item.title: RT by @saving_throw: Once every 70 years the queen of england lays her egg in a random field and whatever lucky soul finds it is given complete immunity to all laws for a full year. This is what british people mean by "jubilee"
item.dc:creator: @pookleblinky
item.description: Once every 70 years the queen of england lays her egg in a random field and whatever lucky soul finds it is given complete immunity to all laws for a full year. This is what british people mean by "jubilee"

item.title: fascinating thread on emergent language/text patterns in generative AI that uses natural language prompts--spooky correspondences. like the facebook chatbots that were shut down in 2017 for going off on their own to talk about balls.
item.dc:creator: @saving_throw
item.description:
fascinating thread on emergent language/text patterns in generative AI that uses natural language prompts--spooky correspondences. like the facebook chatbots that were shut down in 2017 for going off on their own to talk about balls.

nitter.42l.fr/giannis_daras/status/1531693093040230402#m
